Curriculum

The Master of Professional Studies is awarded for completion of 30 credits. Students must maintain a 3.0 cumulative grade point average and fulfill all requirements in a timely manner.

The one-year curriculum requires full-time enrollment.

First semester

PMCD 5101
6 Credits

Major Studio 1
PMCD 5001
3 Credits

Typography and Interaction 1
PMCD 5200
3 Credits

Visual Culture Seminar
3 Credits

Elective

Second semester

PMCD 5102
6 Credits

Major Studio 2
PMCD 5002
3 Credits

Typography and Interaction 2
PMCD 5300
3 Credits

Methods and Practices
3 Credits

Elective

For a complete listing of courses and descriptions, including elective options, visit the The New School’s Course Catalog.

Colophon

This site was built with the help of Parsons MPS faculty and students in collaboration with XXIX. The custom typeface is open-source and can be contributed to by the MPS community (paired with Suisse).

Apply by January

Unknown Conference, a project by Patrick Serr, Poppy Chen, Vidya Keshavan and Carolyn Berry, Typography and Interaction I, Fall 2017
